snippet.title: 8bit Doves - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
8bit Doves by Nitrome

Trapped in a VR world powered by an ancient handheld device, you are forced to endlessly dream in a pixel world of just 4 colours! Doves have taken roost in your prison and though you don’t know it they are the key to your survival. The Doves subconsciously inspire dreams of flight, so take flight through the mazes of your imagination and find the exit!

Intuitive two button gameplay is all you need to steer your way through the sky. Fly through each maze and reach the exit. Get doves to follow you for extra bonus bragging rights on Game Center and Social Networking stuff. If walls aren’t enough challenge you may enjoy the variety of traps that get rapidly added including, moving walls, speed boost zones, growing walls and more!

Features:
• Expanded from the hit Nitrome Jam game!
• 3 level packs each with a different dream theme! (Sweet Dreams, Deep Sleep & Nightmare).
• A unique world realised in 4 Colours! 
• Don’t worry parents this game contains no In app purchases!
• Pixel Art from the award winning Nitrome studio!
• Two button gameplay perfect for a touch screen!


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Cross promotion of Nitrome products.
